= Details =

== Normal Flow ==
 # Detect the current `offset` for the message list selected by the user. 
    * If no offset can be found, set `offset` to 0
    * If `offset<0` set `offset = 0`
 # Display the 10 newest [DomainModelMessage message] created by the current user or an user the current [DomainModelUser user] is following starting with number `offset`
 # If there are more than 10 messages, display a link "Next" in order change the offset to `offset + 10`
 # If the `offset` is bigger 0, display a link "Prev" wich loads the page again with a `offset = currentOffset -10`

== Alternative flows ==

=== User follows no other user ===
 # Display a message box with a warning text (See [PageShowFriends Show Friends])

=== No new messages for current user can be found ===
 # Display a message box with a warning message  (See [PageShowFriends Show Friends])
